title: Marvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series – Complete Season
body:
Marvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series – Complete Season


Genres/Tags: Adventure, QTE, 3D
Company: Telltale Games
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI9
Original Size: 17.7 GB
Repack Size: 6 GB

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x / KAT [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • FreeTorrents
  • Tapochek.net [magnet]
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: MegaUp (Uploaded by Sylvano, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: Upera (Uploaded by Nice_2000, NOT compatible with other mirrors)
  • Filehoster: WorldSrc [Single Direct Link] (Upto 100MB/s, NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Discussion and (possible) future updates on CS.RIN.RU thread

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Marvels.Guardians.of.the.Galaxy.Episode.5-CODEX ISO release: codex-marvels.guardians.of.the.galaxy.episode.5.iso (19,058,262,016 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & but NOT MD5 Perfect: encryption was removed from game archives, but original compression is preserved, so you won’t experience any lagging during gameplay unlike with repacks with all resources decompressed
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 17.7 to 6 GB)
  • Installation takes: ~12 minutes on 8-cores CPU; ~25 minutes on 4-cores CPU; ~45 minutes on 2-cores CPU
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 18 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses ZTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Marvel’s Guardians of the Galaxy: The Telltale Series delivers a brand new story of the universe’s unlikeliest heroes, the rag-tag band of outlaws who go by the names Star-Lord, Gamora, Drax, Rocket, and Groot. In the wake of an epic battle, the Guardians discover an artifact of unspeakable power. Each of the Guardians has a reason to desire this relic, as does a ruthless enemy who is the last of her kind, and who will stop at nothing to tear it from their hands.

From Earth to the Milano to Knowhere and beyond, and set to the beat of awesome music, this five-part episodic series puts you in the rocket-powered boots of Star-Lord in an original Guardians adventure, told in the unique and award-winning Telltale style, where your decisions and actions will drive the path of the story you experience.

Includes access to all five episodes in this all-new series from the award-winning studio, Telltale Games.
